subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|酉|迷|t1=oxygenated functional group|t2=confusion|ls=ic}}, referring to the anesthetic properties of [[diethyl ether]]. {{l|mul|迷}} also acts as the phonetic component.

subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text: From {{zh-l|迷|confusion}}, referring to the anesthetic properties of [[diethyl ether]].
